summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Weekly Digest + Executive Summary feature. All backend API tests (12/12) and frontend UI tests (10/10) passed. The feature is fully functional with EN/FR bilingual support, mobile-responsive design, and visual-first approach.
passed_tests: GET /api/coach/digest returns 200 with correct response structure
Executive summary is concise (max 1 sentence, under 200 chars)
Metrics contain total_sessions, total_distance_km, total_duration_min
Signals array contains 3 items: load (Volume), intensity, consistency
Insights array contains max 3 short items
Zone distribution (z1-z5) included in metrics
French language parameter returns French content
No Strava/Garmin references in digest content
Period dates are valid ISO format (~7 day range)
generated_at timestamp is valid ISO format
GET /api/coach/digest/latest endpoint works
Digest page loads correctly with data-testid='digest-page'
Executive summary displays in card component
Visual signals grid shows Volume (+25%), Intensity (Balanced), Consistency (100%)
Metrics bar shows sessions (7), km (161.1), hours (8.4)
Zone distribution bar displays with color-coded segments (Z1-Z5)
Coach Notes section shows 3 AI-generated insights
View Full Analysis button navigates to /coach
Refresh button triggers digest reload
Navigation includes Digest tab
French translations work (Digest Hebdo, Seances, Heures, Notes du Coach)
Mobile layout is responsive and readable (390x844 viewport)
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - proper separation of concerns between digest calculation and AI generation
i18n translations are complete for both EN and FR
data-testid attributes properly added for testing
seed_data_creation: None - using existing mock workout data with dynamic dates (last 14 days)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Weekly Digest feature is complete and working. Uses GPT-5.2 via EMERGENT_LLM_KEY for AI-generated executive summary and insights. Mock workout data has dynamic dates (today - 14 days). The digest compares current week (7 days) to baseline week (previous 7 days). All visual indicators (Volume, Intensity, Consistency) are color-coded. Zone distribution bar shows Z1-Z5 percentages. French translations are complete.
mocked_api_note: MOCKED: Workout data is mocked with dynamic dates until real Strava sync is enabled. AI (GPT-5.2) generates real insights based on mock data.
